name: Ferd Ray
flavorText: The reckless protagonist of Stories of the Dead: Black & White and THE GAME, also featured in Totally Fine. He's known for tackling his foes and obstacles in the most absurd ways possible and never giving up.

name: Ena Lone
flavorText: THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT!

name: Hazune Niku
flavorText: THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT! THIS IS DUMMY TEXT!

name: Juno Evergreen ✰
flavorText: Juno is a cybernetic animal suffering from a taxing ailment, formerly used by the citadel as a weapon, she has now found freedom with the help of new allies.

name: Georg ✰
flavorText: Like a gamer, racist... turt- look man idk I just type these in.

name: Icy Cruz ✰
flavorText: An axolotl who loves nothing more than his girlfriend (and food), it'll take a moment for him to warm up to you, but you'll have found a real ride or die.

name: Jinx ✰
flavorText: A free spirited coyote who's not above picking on their friends, but who'll always be there in their time of need.

name: Toby ✰
flavorText: Toby is a domestic housecat who bagged a baddie so out of his league he'll never quite figure it out.

name: Taylor ✰
flavorText: An anxious and directionless jackalope who'd be more than content drifting through life, was it not for his friends pushing him to do more.

name: Welder ✰
flavorText: Carefree robot specialising in welding, construction and repair. If you need any help with mechanical construction and repairs contact on: [REDACTED]
